<optional title, max 6 words>

<setup: tense conversation, characters in a room>
<optional narration, ≤ 6 words>
Razumihin: “What were you thinking? Why the secrecy?”  

Raskolnikov: “I was sick of them! I ran away!”  

Zametov: “You seemed sensible, but irritable.”  

---
<setup: tense atmosphere, characters on edge>
<optional narration, ≤ 6 words>
Porfiry: “You met a man last night?”  

Razumihin: “You gave all your money away!”  

Raskolnikov: “Maybe I found a treasure!”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Raskolnikov expresses his defiance and irritation while discussing his recent actions and financial decisions with Razumihin and Zametov.
